meanings: (자동차·시설·설비 등의) maintenance, service, (수리) repair, maintain, service, (수리하다) repair

vlive.korean: 생각을 좀 정비할 시간이 필요... You may have needed time to think about... 듣기 View video Dingo Freestyle / 딩고프리스타일 : 창모 더콰이엇 번지점프를 하러 가다 | 아마두 차트 공약 #2 ㅣ둘도 없는 힙합 친구 : 다모임ㅣDingo Freestyle

vlive.korean: 컵은 정비된 3호컵 정비로 - 매트 안에? - 네? Number 3 cup which was just aligned. - On the mat? - What? 듣기 View video OSEN : MONSTA X 'Star Road' 하이라이트 06. 아이엠
vlive.english: Number 3 cup which was just aligned. - On the mat? - What?

vlive.korean: 컨디션 정비하고 내일 이제... And maintain the best condition of ourselves for tomorrow. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [BTS] 미니모니 마니마니마니 사랑하니까 나는 마니야! 미니모니 진짜 마니 사랑해💜(RM&JIMIN talking about their episode)
vlive.english: And maintain the best condition of ourselves for tomorrow.

vlive.korean: [본격 촬영 시작 전 정비 중인 멤버들] - 멘탈 케어 - 립 필요하시나요? [Preparing for a shooting] - Mental care. - Anyone wants this lip care product? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.74
vlive.english: [Preparing for a shooting] - Mental care. - Anyone wants this lip care product?

vlive.korean: 지금 정비하고 있어요. I am organizing it right now. 듣기 View video V Beauty : 개강맞이 여신 메이크업 / Become a goddess at begin school
vlive.english: I am organizing it right now.
